description: Given an expression such as expression = "e + 8 - a + 5" and an evaluation map such as {"e": 1} (given in terms of evalvars = ["e"] and evalints = [1]), return a list of tokens representing the simplified expression, such as ["-1*a","14"] Expressions are evaluated in the usual order: brackets first, then multiplication, then addition and subtraction. The format of the output is as follows: Note: You may assume that the given expression is always valid. All intermediate results will be in the range of [-231, 231 - 1].
